mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (uid, pid, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{pid}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT cid, uid, pid, cart.price, cart.num, product.title, product.price AS realPrice, product.image FROM cart LEFT JOIN product ON cart.pid = product.id WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY cart.created_time DESC
